title: Understanding ADHD
text: ADHD is a common neurodevelopmental disorder that affects children and can continue into adulthood. It involves a combination of persistent problems, such as difficulty sustaining attention, hyperactivity, and impulsive behavior.

title: Symptoms of ADHD
text: Individuals with ADHD may exhibit symptoms such as being easily distracted, having trouble focusing on tasks, being forgetful in daily activities, and having difficulty organizing tasks and activities.

hintAnswer: difficulty paying attention, difficulty controlling impulsive behaviors, or excessive activity
